alfredsnippet.snippet:
"... elements and principles do not exist. What does exist is the qualitatively neutral matter of the mechanical philosophy, divided into particles differentiated only by size, shape and motion. From their various combinations rise all the appearances of the substances with which chemists deal."

- Robert Boyle (1661)
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Robert Boyle on Chemistry (1661)
